newsitem.title: ITALY: Olivetti, France Telecom deal seen.
newsitem.headline: Olivetti, France Telecom deal seen.

text.p: France Telecom's entry into Olivetti's Infostrada fixed-line telecoms joint venture is "imminent", Rome daily La Repubblica said on Friday.
The newspaper added that an agreement had already been reached with the French group as well as Bell Atlantic which owns 33 percent of the venture and Olivetti the rest.
Olivetti declined to comment on the report.
